page.title: 08Nork Park School
page.content: Nork Park School, a 49 year old school, now comphrensive and co-educational is one of two secondary schools serving the area. It has 787 pupils and 51 teachers and other ancilliary staff. The 6 acre site at the edge of Nork Park, where the school has playing fields, was once part of a large country estate last occupied by the Colman family. The school offers a wide range of subjects to pupils of all abilities from the age of 12 to 18 years. The present Headmaster is Mr. F.J. Norris. School activities include dramatic and musical productions (Oliver in 1985) providing ball boys and girls for the Wimbledon Tennis Tournament. The P.T.A. through various fund raising activities provides extra facilities such as a school minibus. The school motto is{ 'Enter Into Knowledge'}
